metadata.name: Suspicious Mshta.EXE Execution Patterns
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious mshta process execution patterns

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\mshta.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('mshta.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\cmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\regsvr32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\wscript.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\programdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\public\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\'))) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\mshta.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('mshta.exe') AND NOT ((startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\syswow64\\\\'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.htm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.hta'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mshta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mshta'))))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious mshta process execution patterns
